text: Nu Shooz are an R&B; group based in Portland, Oregon.They formed in 1979. They released many records in the 1980s. However, they did not hit the mainstream until after their 1986 album Poolside was released. The song I Can't Wait was among their many hit songs. In 1988 the band broke up. In 2007 they got back together. title: Nu Shooz
